document_data.mainbody:
Hugh was a young man living in the village of Tweyar in Tethyr in the mid-to-late 14 century DR who joined the Tweyar Self-Defense Force.
Hugh was a relatively stealthy and skilled hunter.
Because of his skills at hunting, Hugh was chosen to accompany Vander Stillhawk in the Tweyar Self-Defense Forces second battle, in which they attacked a bandit camp. Before dawn, each shot a sentry, successfully allowing the entire group to raid the encampment without an alarm being raised.
